nodes.text: The Multi-Purpose Missile Bank XVI was an anti-vehicle/starfighter ground emplacement weapon produced by Bryn & Gweith. Consisting of seven banks of six launchers each, a standard magazine of 36 missiles were held in reserve to be auto-loaded as necessary. These missile banks were linked to a variety of targeting sensors and could use an appropriate missile to attack targets on the ground, in the air or in space. A crew of six was necessary to operate the missile bank although a skeleton crew of three could manage.
A number of these missile banks were used to defend Fortress Keremark from attack.
